text.menu.better-item-save.itemGiveError: An error occured while giving you the item, check the logs for more information.
text.menu.better-item-save.hotbarFullErr: The item wasn't given, as your hotbar is full!
text.menu.better-item-save.error: An error occured! Check the logs for more information.
text.command.better-item-save.saveItem.e: An error occurred while saving the item. Check the logs for more information.
text.config.better-item-save.option.hori: Sets the horizontal menu size in %
text.config.better-item-save.option.vert: Sets the vertical menu size in %
text.config.better-item-save.option.show: Whether or not to show an item preview, this can cause lag when opening the menu if you have many or big items saved.
